answerText: Kalahari Desert[10] In its southwest, the Kalahari merges with this desert, whose name means "vast place". It is a truer desert than the Kalahari and is located along the Atlantic coast of a similarly named nation.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Michigan A + George Mason | 21 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This desert is home to a namesake population of Bushmen. For 10 points each: [10] Name this large desert that stretches across most of Botswana into the northwest portion of South Africa. Its Okavango Swamp is a massive inland delta for the Okavango River.
